Description:
The refreshed Copilot landing page in Microsoft 365 admin center gives an at-a-glance view of your Copilot journey across Chat, Agents, and M365 Copilot. It includes success metrics for each pillar, new metrics like active chat users, assisted hours, and satisfaction rate, plus multi-signal, personalized and actionable insights to drive adoption. Weâ€™ve added a security pivot for Purview actions and centralized Copilot usage reports under a new usage pivot.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Your Command Center for AI Success
